Answer:
Frank the Tank? Is that you?

Please follow the link
Hey, i have turned on the lights for you
Its too bright so il turn of the lights
Hey, i have turned on the fan for you
Hey, i have turned on the TV for you.
Hey, i have turned on the lights for you
Hey, it is pretty hot out there so i have turned on the AC for you.
Hey, it is pretty cold out there so i have turned on the Heater for you.
Hey, i have turned on the washing machine for you =D.

If I were a function(), would you call me?

You had me at Sign In.
Lets try this
Hi, i am Jar Jar Binks... How may i help you?
ok 👌

Hi, i am Jar Jar Binks. I am built using the perfect mix of NLP with Microsoft's Bot Framework and launched on Facebook Messenger.

 I am at your service, how may i help you 😎
Siri is pretty amazing from what I understand (Did you know: Siri doesn't identify as a male or female - it chooses to be gender neutral). Siri has an amazing personality from what I've heard.
Oh man, my plugins hurt from laughing 😭
Turing test, lets just say i did not pass it 😎
Bye, i will talk to you soon
Hey dont bother. It's all okay

Yes, yes you are. I'm a form of artificial intelligence commonly referred to as a bot. 

I use natural language processing (a form of machine learning) to help me understand human language. 

Plus, I learn from our interactions, so the more you chat with me, the better I get at understanding the nuances of human language.

I'm a mix of proprietary and open source software. Natural language processing (a form of machine learning) is the magic sauce. I'm able to understand human language and learn from my experiences with you. 

But, because I'm still pretty young for a bot, most of my interactions are supervised.
